[00:00.00]Stuck with U - Ariana Grande (爱莉安娜·格兰德)/Justin Bieber (贾斯汀·比伯)
[00:00.21]Lyrics by：Gian Stone/Freddy Wexler/Ariana Grande/Justin Bieber/Skyler Stonestreet/Whitney Phillips/Scooter Braun
[00:00.43]Composed by：Gian Stone/Freddy Wexler/Ariana Grande/Justin Bieber/Skyler Stonestreet/Whitney Phillips/Scooter Braun
[00:00.65]Ariana Grande：
[00:04.97]Mmm
[00:08.85]Hey yeah
[00:12.47]That's just for fun
[00:14.87]What
[00:15.30]Ariana Grande：
[00:20.55]I'm not one to stick around
[00:24.55]One strike and you're out baby
[00:26.61]Don't care if I sound crazy
[00:28.51]But you never let me down
[00:30.88]No no
[00:32.07]That's why when the sun's up I'm stayin'
[00:34.58]Still layin' in your bed sayin'
[00:36.65]Ooh ooh ooh ooh
[00:39.53]Got all this time on our hands
[00:43.63]Might as well cancel our plans ah
[00:47.24]
[00:48.35]I could stay here for a lifetime
[00:52.36]So lock the door and throw out the key
[00:56.10]Can't fight this no more
[00:58.35]It's just you and me
[01:00.09]And there's nothin' I nothin' I I can do
[01:04.36]I'm stuck with you stuck with you stuck with you
[01:08.32]So go ahead and drive me insane
[01:12.09]Baby run your mouth I still wouldn't change
[01:16.32]Being stuck with you stuck with you stuck with you
[01:20.50]I'm stuck with you stuck with you stuck with you baby
[01:24.39]Justin Bieber：
[01:24.75]There's nowhere we need to be
[01:27.15]No no no
[01:28.74]I'ma get to know you better
[01:30.89]Kinda hope we're here forever
[01:32.90]There's nobody on these streets
[01:37.01]If you told me that the world's endin'
[01:38.88]Ain't no other way that I can spend it
[01:40.79]Justin Bieber/Ariana Grande：
[01:41.43]Ooh ooh ooh ooh
[01:43.98]Got all this time in my hands
[01:48.04]Might as well cancel our plans
[01:52.62]I could stay here forever
[01:56.06]Justin Bieber/Ariana Grande：
[01:56.70]So lock the door and throw out the key
[02:00.31]Can't fight this no more
[02:02.75]It's just you and me
[02:04.29]And there's nothin' I nothin' I I can do
[02:08.83]I'm stuck with you stuck with you stuck with you
[02:13.00]So go ahead and drive me insane
[02:16.83]Baby run your mouth I still wouldn't change
[02:20.44]Being stuck with you stuck with you stuck with you
[02:24.92]I'm stuck with you stuck with you stuck with you
[02:28.26]Justin Bieber/Ariana Grande：
[02:29.04]Oh oh oh oh
[02:31.25]Baby come take all my time
[02:35.25]Go on make me lose my mind
[02:39.21]We got all that we need here tonight
[02:44.23]Ariana Grande/Justin Bieber：
[02:44.91]I lock the door
[02:46.02]Lock the door
[02:47.13]And throw out the key
[02:48.49]Can't fight this no more
[02:49.96]Can't fight this no more

[02:56.98]I'm stuck with you stuck with you stuck with you
[03:01.19]So go ahead and drive me insane

[03:28.51]Ariana Grande：
[03:29.38]Stuck with you stuck with you stuck with you

[00:00.65]//
[00:04.97]//
[00:08.85]//
[00:12.47]只是为了增添乐趣
[00:14.87]什么
[00:15.30]//
[00:20.55]我不是一个优柔寡断的人
[00:24.55]我向来果决 宝贝
[00:26.61]不在乎我的说法是否夸张
[00:28.51]但你从未让我失望
[00:30.88]//
[00:32.07]所以每当太阳升起 我仍留守原地
[00:34.58]仍在你的床头低语呢喃
[00:36.65]//
[00:39.53]岁月绵长 尽由我们掌控
[00:43.63]不如取消我们的计划吧
[00:47.24]
[00:48.35]我情愿于此驻足一生
[00:52.36]所以锁上门 把钥匙丢掉
[00:56.10]无法再抗拒
[00:58.35]只属于你我的二人世界
[01:00.09]我情难自抑 情难自抑
[01:04.36]我只钟情于你 只愿与你厮守
[01:08.32]跟随内心 让我为你痴狂
[01:12.09]宝贝 不必多言 我绝不会改变
[01:16.32]我只钟情于你 只愿与你厮守
[01:20.50]我只钟情于你 只愿与你厮守 宝贝
[01:24.39]//
[01:24.75]我们于此相守便是最好 无需另寻他处
[01:27.15]//
[01:28.74]时光悠悠 我会更了解你的一切
[01:30.89]私心希望我们相伴到永远
[01:32.90]望着无人的街
[01:37.01]如果你告诉我这就是世界末日
[01:38.88]那么当下与你相处的分秒都是我最无憾的选择
[01:40.79]//
[01:41.43]//
[01:43.98]岁月绵长 尽由我掌控
[01:48.04]不如取消我们的计划吧
